title: RP GIFT CARD ISSUE
body: Hi! I bought an 50$ RP GIFT CARD from a store and when i tried to remove the label part  ,  unfortunately a part of my RP code got stuck into the label part and that happened about 1 hour ago so i hope someone can help me with that please , Thank you!

replies.body: OH noooooes! Sometimes those codes are just a wee bit too fragile. That's alright, hit up our billing team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they should be able to get that code recovered for ya!
